Copyright 2018-2018 Edipo Souza

This software is provided as an open source project, free for use and share. Lotus Tracker collect user information about Magic the Gathering Arena card game, such as user collection, wildcards, deck and matches.

Lotus Tracker will not shared any user data, but anonymously, match data will be data be used for statistics propourse.

Permission is granted to anyone to use this software for non-commercial purpose. The code is free for study and contribution, but not allowed to be altered and redistribute as other application for MtgArena.
